data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Kancheepuram, Tamil Nadu, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kancheepuram, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kancheepuram.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 43,981 believers in the county of Kancheepuram to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
God, we pray for the believers in Kancheepuram, Tamil Nadu, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, remember the Malakkuravan people. Make the Malakkuravan people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Kancheepuram, Tamil Nadu, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 799 new simple churches in the county of Kancheepuram, Tamil Nadu, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 3,998,300 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Kancheepuram, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

location.name: Kancheepuram
location.people_groups_list: Indo-French, Tiruvalluvar, Perumal Makkukkaran, Irular, Adi Dravida
